column4: i just have one question still, i have a partition NTFS on my hdd thts used as backup from my xp Os cani access through ubuntu ?
variant how can i do so plz
as u noticed im a newbie this is my 6th day using ubuntu
or linux in general
spacebass thank you, everythings pretty much perfect.. i cant believe it took me this long to switch
ok thanks you variant
spacebass well so far so good.. though i admit i had a lil prob with ICS
and now facing a HUGE problem with GAIM
with no apparent reason
I had that happen too before I went to feisty... mainly when using MSN
and it got resolved?
It seems like it.
seems i might go for an upgrade then
Don't let that be the only reason to go to feisty though... you might want to try compiling the newest source or finding a newer .deb
thts wht im gonna try.. ill b trying AMSN for a few days if it works ill stick to where i am
Okay. I'll try to find a link now
That repo has the newest version of GAIM, beta6 (the one I use)
found it thank you :)
Awesome. If you get authentication errors, wget http://repository.debuntu.org/GPG-Key-chantra.txt && sudo apt-key add GPG-Key-chantra.txt
once again thanks for helping out :)
